title: Putin says Russia doesn't want war with Ukraine but urges West to meet his demands quickly
content:
1. Putin says Russia doesn't want war with Ukraine but urges West to meet his demands quickly  NBC News
  2. Former US ambassador to Russia says Putin's 'acting crazy' over Ukraine  Business Insider
  3. Putin Praises U.S. Response to Security Ideas as 'Positive'  Bloomberg
  4. ''It's not us who threaten anyone': Putin urges NATO pledges  Associated Press
  5. Amid fears Russia will invade Ukraine, Putin points finger at U.S. and NATO in marathon news conference  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Putin says Russia doesn't want war with Ukraine but urges West to meet his demands quickly  NBC News
Former US ambassador to Russia says Putin's 'acting crazy' over Ukraine  Business Insider
Putin Praises U.S. Response to Security Ideas as 'Positive'  Bloomberg
''It's not us who threaten anyone': Putin urges NATO pledges  Associated Press
Amid fears Russia will invade Ukraine, Putin points finger at U.S. and NATO in marathon news conference  The Washington Post

localize.title: プーチン大統領は、ロシアはウクライナとの戦争を望んでいないが、西側諸国は彼の要求に早く応じるよう求めていると述べた。
普京称俄罗斯不希望与乌克兰开战，但敦促西方迅速满足其要求
普京稱俄羅斯不希望與烏克蘭開戰，但敦促西方迅速滿足其要求
